alert.note: Alert for Attala (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 7:14PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Attala County through 800 PM CDT... At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mcadams, or near Kosciusko, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Kosciusko around 720 PM CDT. Smyrna around 730 PM CDT. Zama around 740 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Mccool and Ethel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
